liteInstanceError.title: Invalid instance

noKey.subtitle: The selected activity tracker instance does not have an attached ingestion key. You can obtain a key by running the "Obtain key" action from the instance detail page.

liteExistingInstanceError.subtitle: You can only have one Lite plan instance of this service per account. Delete your current Lite plan instance to create a new one.
